item.title: 肯尼亚连续第二次降息
item.description: 由于食品和燃料价格上涨放缓，通货膨胀率降至 12 年来的最低点，肯尼亚中央银行连续第二次下调基准利率。【原文：Kenya’s central bank cut its benchmark interest rate for the second consecutive time after inflation eased to a 12-year low on slower food and fuel price increases.】

item.title: 波兰亿万富翁索洛兹将其子开除出 Cyfrowy 董事会
item.description: 波兰亿万富翁齐格蒙特-索洛兹（Zygmunt Solorz）将其子从其媒体和移动集团 Cyfrowy Polsat SA 的监事会中解职，这是其家族争夺集团控制权的最新一幕。【原文：Polish billionaire Zygmunt Solorz dismissed his son from the supervisory board of his media and mobile group Cyfrowy Polsat SA in the latest chapter of the family feud over control of his conglomerate.】

item.title: 富达即将推出改版桌面交易平台
item.description: 富达投资（Fidelity Investments）为活跃交易者推出了全新的桌面平台，处理速度更快，外观焕然一新。【原文：Fidelity Investments is unveiling a revamped desktop platform for active traders, featuring faster processing speeds and a refreshed look.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚生态石油公司重返债券市场为债务回购融资
item.description: 哥伦比亚国有石油公司今年第二次利用国际债务市场，向投资者回购多达 12.5 亿美元的债券。【原文：Colombia’s state oil company is tapping international debt markets for the second time this year as it moves to buy back as much as $1.25 billion of bonds from investors.】

item.title: El-Erian 称债券市场 "缺乏锚定 "美联储降息路径
item.description: 穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）说，美联储货币政策路径的猜谜游戏正在造成市场波动。【原文：Mohamed El-Erian says that the guessing game that’s taking place over the Federal Reserve’s path for monetary policy is creating market volatility.】

item.title: 冲突不断，以色列主要机场客流量下降 43
item.description: 特拉维夫本古里安国际机场的乘客人数在 2024 年前九个月下降了 43%，原因是 10 月 7 日的袭击和随后的冲突促使航空公司撤出或减少了从该枢纽起飞的航班。【原文：Passenger numbers at Tel Aviv’s Ben Gurion International Airport fell 43% in the first nine months of 2024 as the Oct. 7 attacks and subsequent conflict prompted airlines to pull out or reduce flights from the the hub.】

item.title: 戴蒙称监管机构应减少上市障碍
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）说。【原文：Regulators in the US and UK should make it easier for companies to go public, JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon said.】

item.title: Pimco 和霸菱质疑阿根廷多久能再次出售债券
item.description: 阿根廷经济部长路易斯-卡普托（Luis Caputo）上个月在摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Argentina’s Economy Minister Luis Caputo told investors during a presentation in JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s New York offices last month that the government expects to sell bonds abroad again by January 2026.】

item.title: 据称德国将利用花旗、德意志银行和瑞银进行 Uniper 资产剥离
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德国政府已选定银行安排潜在的电力公司 Uniper SE 出售计划，该计划可能成为德国近年来最大的股票出售计划之一。【原文：Germany’s government has selected banks to arrange a potential selldown of power company Uniper SE, which could rank among the country’s biggest share sales in recent years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 兴登堡押注游戏平台，Roblox暴跌
item.description: Roblox 公司股价在周二的盘前交易中暴跌，此前做空机构 Hindenburg Research 表示将押注该游戏平台。【原文：Roblox Corp. shares slumped in premarket trading Tuesday after short seller Hindenburg Research said it’s betting against the gaming platform.】

item.title: 欧盟警告西班牙错过预算计划截止日期的风险
item.description: 欧盟委员会警告西班牙不要在超过法定期限后再向布鲁塞尔提交预算草案。【原文：The European Commission has warned Spain against submitting its draft budget to Brussels well past the legal deadline.】

item.title: 法国电力集团就捷克与韩国公司的核电交易向欧盟投诉
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）上个月向欧盟竞争监管机构投诉，称捷克一家公用事业公司决定选择一家韩国国有集团作为建造两座核反应堆的优先竞标者。【原文：Electricite de France SA filed a complaint last month to the European Union competition regulator over a Czech utility’s decision to pick a Korean state-owned group as a preferred bidder for the construction of two nuclear reactors.】

item.title: CFA 一级通过率降至 44%，仍高于历史平均水平
item.description: 特许金融分析师第一级考试的通过率仍然高于历史平均水平，但推迟考试的考生的成功率仍然要低得多。【原文：The pass rate for the first level of the chartered financial analyst exam remained above its historic average, though test-takers who delayed their exam continued to have a much lower success rate.】

item.title: 自动驾驶汽车？为什么下一次乘车可能需要人类副驾驶？
item.description: 二十年前，美国军方在其具有开创意义的 Darpa 挑战赛中，派出一支初出茅庐的机器人车队穿越莫哈韦沙漠，拉开了制造自动驾驶汽车竞赛的序幕。十年后的今天，汽车行业热闹非凡，纷纷预测自动驾驶汽车将遍布公路。【原文：Two decades ago, the US military kicked off the race to build a self-driving car by sending a fleet of fledgling robot vehicles across the Mojave Desert in its seminal Darpa challenge. Ten years later, the auto industry was buzzing with predictions that self-driving cars would be all over the roads by now.】

item.title: 电影世界利用巴克莱银行和德意志银行进行 18 亿美元再融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，电影世界集团公司正在与巴克莱银行和德意志银行合作，与投资者商讨债务再融资事宜，以降低公司的融资成本。【原文：Cineworld Group Plc is working with Barclays Plc and Deutsche Bank AG to talk to investors about refinancing debt to lower the company’s funding costs, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 申银万国英国销售额达 20 亿美元，可能在伦敦上市
item.description: 去年，Shein 在英国的销售额飙升至 15.5 亿英镑（约合 20 亿美元），而这家在线时尚零售商可能会在伦敦进行首次公开募股。【原文：Shein’s UK sales soared to £1.55 billion ($2 billion) last year ahead of the online fashion retailer’s potential initial public offering in London.】

item.title: Azul 与出租人达成协议，免除 30 亿雷亚尔债务
item.description: Azul SA 与出租人和原始设备制造商（OEM）达成协议，以减少航空公司的负债。【原文：Azul SA reached an agreement with its lessors and original equipment manufacturers, or OEMs, to reduce the airline’s liabilities.】

item.title: 动荡的美国融资市场预示着 2024 年将以动荡收尾
item.description: 最近美国融资市场流动性压力加大，这让华尔街的一些人感到紧张，担心今年最后一个月会面临更大的挑战。【原文：The latest heightened liquidity pressures in the US funding market have some on Wall Street nervous about even greater challenges in the final month of the year.】

item.title: FirstRand 更加看好南非经济和兰特
item.description: FirstRand Ltd. 更加看好南非经济，认为明年经济增长加速至 2%、兰特升值至 1 美元兑 16 兰特以下的可能性更大。【原文：FirstRand Ltd. has turned more bullish on South Africa’s economy, and now sees a greater chance of economic growth accelerating to 2% and the rand strengthening to below 16 per dollar next year.】

item.title: Pinterest 走出跌势，成为华尔街新宠
item.description: 在经历了一个动荡的夏天之后，华尔街开始重新审视 Pinterest 公司。到目前为止，分析师们很喜欢他们所看到的。【原文：After a volatile summer, Wall Street is taking another look at Pinterest Inc. So far, analysts like what they see.】

item.title: 随着 2030 年的临近，能源转型必须由龟变兔
item.description:
BloombergNEF 称，在本十年的剩余时间里，每年用于可再生能源的支出需要翻一番。【原文：

BloombergNEF says annual spending on renewable power needs to double for the rest of this decade. 

】

item.title: 森特诺警告欧洲央行不要采取大动作，呼吁 "循序渐进
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）认为，欧洲中央银行在降息时应避免采取过激行动。【原文：The European Central Bank should avoid outsized moves in lowering interest rates, according to Governing Council member Mario Centeno.】

item.title: 现代汽车力争在下周创纪录的印度首次公开募股中筹资 33 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，现代汽车公司正寻求通过其印度子公司的首次公开募股筹集多达 33 亿美元的资金，从而拉开该国有史以来最大规模上市的序幕。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. is seeking to raise as much as $3.3 billion through an initial public offering of its Indian unit, people familiar with the matter said, kicking off the country’s biggest-ever listing.】

item.title: Blackstone 将为意大利公司提供超过 2.5 亿欧元的债务
item.description: 私人信贷基金管理公司 Blackstone Inc. 即将达成一项交易，提供超过 2.5 亿欧元（3.29 亿美元）的一揽子债务，为 Wateralia SpA 的现有债务再融资，这是意大利借款人寻求直接贷款人融资的最新案例。【原文：Private credit fund manager Blackstone Inc. is nearing a deal to provide a debt package of more than €250 million ($329 million) to refinance the existing debt of Wateralia SpA, in the latest example of an Italian borrower seeking financing from a direct lender.】

item.title: 华尔街认为国防股的狂飙突进还有更大空间
item.description: 在地缘政治紧张局势加剧时，押注国防供应商会有回报，这已不是什么秘密；至少在短期内是这样。但华尔街认为，最近的反弹还有其他原因。【原文：It’s no secret that betting on defense suppliers when geopolitical tensions ratchet higher pays off — at least in the short term. But Wall Street says there’s more to this latest rally.】

item.title: 印度人工智能初创企业寻求颠覆英语学习
item.description: 人工智能正在对学习产生巨大影响，以无数种方式增强辅导员和学习者的能力，并重塑印度的教育系统。但首先...【原文：Artificial intelligence is having a big impact on learning, empowering tutors and learners in myriad ways and reshaping the education system in India. But first...】

item.title: 人身伤害法人工智能初创公司估值超过 10 亿美元
item.description: 为律师事务所提供人工智能产品的人身伤害初创公司 EvenUp Inc. 在新一轮融资中筹集了 1.35 亿美元，估值超过 10 亿美元。【原文：EvenUp Inc., a personal injury startup making artificial intelligence products for law firms, has raised $135 million in a new funding round valuing it at more than $1 billion.】

item.title: Radical Ventures 旨在通过课程和 GPU 吸引人工智能创始人
item.description: 风险投资公司激进风投（Radical Ventures）正在寻找可能想创办自己公司的人工智能研究人员，为十多位 "对创始人充满好奇心 "的学者和技术人员提供约 25 万美元的计算积分，用于尝试新创意。【原文：Venture capital firm Radical Ventures is seeking artificial intelligence researchers who might want to start their own company, offering more than a dozen “founder-curious” academics and tech workers about $250,000 in compute credits to try out new ideas.】

item.title: Temu 瞄准亚马逊 Fire TV 流媒体产品，推出售价 4 美元的遥控器
item.description: 与亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）展开激烈竞争的 Temu 正瞄准这家电子商务巨头最受欢迎的产品线之一：Fire TV 流媒体设备。【原文：Temu, locked in a fierce rivalry with Amazon.com Inc., is targeting one of the e-commerce giant’s most popular product lines: the Fire TV streaming device.】

item.title: 消费金融初创公司 Stash 表示创始人将重新担任联席首席执行官
item.description: 消费金融初创公司 Stash 任命其联合创始人为联合首席执行官。【原文：Consumer-finance startup Stash named its co-founders as co-chief executive officers.】
